abilities.name: Dragon Fanatic.
abilities.description: The dragonsoul has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. While the dragonsoul can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonsoul ignores the effects of being charmed or frightened.

abilities.name: Fanatic Advantage.
abilities.description: Once per turn, if the dragonsoul makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage.

abilities.name: Limited Flight.
abilities.description: The dragonsoul can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics.
abilities.description: The dragonsoul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonclaw's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
